TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RotateFlipType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how much an image is rotated and the axis used to flip the image.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The image is rotated in a clockwise direction.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.RotateFlip%2A> property of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> and the <xref:System.Drawing.RotateFlipType> enumeration.
This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> named `PictureBox1` and a button named `Button1`. Paste the code into a form, call `InitializeBitmap` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method and associate `Button1_Click` with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event. Ensure the file path to the bitmap is valid on your system.
[!code-cpp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType Rotate180FlipNone = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies a 180-degree clockwise rotation without flipping.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType Rotate180FlipX = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Specifies a 180-degree clockwise rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType Rotate180FlipXY = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies a 180-degree clockwise rotation followed by a horizontal and vertical flip.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType Rotate180FlipY = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Specifies a 180-degree clockwise rotation followed by a vertical flip.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType Rotate270FlipNone = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Specifies a 270-degree clockwise rotation without flipping.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType Rotate270FlipX = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Specifies a 270-degree clockwise rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType Rotate270FlipXY = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies a 270-degree clockwise rotation followed by a horizontal and vertical flip.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType Rotate270FlipY = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Specifies a 270-degree clockwise rotation followed by a vertical flip.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType Rotate90FlipNone = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies a 90-degree clockwise rotation without flipping.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType Rotate90FlipX = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Specifies a 90-degree clockwise rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType Rotate90FlipXY = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Specifies a 90-degree clockwise rotation followed by a horizontal and vertical flip.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType Rotate90FlipY = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Specifies a 90-degree clockwise rotation followed by a vertical flip.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType RotateNoneFlipNone = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies no clockwise rotation and no flipping.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType RotateNoneFlipX = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Specifies no clockwise rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType RotateNoneFlipXY = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies no clockwise rotation followed by a horizontal and vertical flip.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.RotateFlipType RotateNoneFlipY = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Specifies no clockwise rotation followed by a vertical flip.
